_header: The governor that guideth with virtue and grace
_description: Verses on good rule — six couplets

BLAdd20059.First Lines:
The gouernowre that gydethe with vertue and graceShulde neuer be
                    changed lest avoorse haue his place…
BLAdd20059.Last Lines:
…He that is willing pease for to makeMost be indifferent &
                    his partie take
